meals.name: Spicy Vegetarian Sopa Azteca (Tortilla Soup) with Ancho, Pasilla & Guajillo Chiles**
meals.notes: We added black beans which gave it a bit of depth. Don’t forget to de-seed the chilis and watch the heat
meals.ingredients: 2 tablespoons Extra Virgin Olive Oil, 4 cups tomatoes (diced), 6 cups vegetable broth, 1 onion (diced), 4 cloves garlic (minced), 2-3 ancho chiles, 1-2 pasilla chiles, 2 guajillo chiles, 2-3 Serrano peppers (sliced), 4 corn tortillas, 1½ cups corn kernels, 1 avocado (sliced), 3 tablespoons fresh cilantro, 3 tablespoons fresh recao, 1 lime, salt, pepper
